#summary access to the source code

= Get the Source =

Use the given shell commands to fetch the source code of ZIME projects.

== ibus-zime ==
Use the following command to checkout the source, or access our [url=http://github.com/lotem/ibus-zime web interface].
{{{
git clone git://github.com/lotem/ibus-zime.git
}}}

== zime-web 0.x ==
{{{
svn checkout http://zime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/zime-web
}}}

== Combo Pinyin for Windows ==
{{{
svn checkout http://zime.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/zime-win32
}}}

You may also visit [http://code.google.com/p/zime/source/browse/ Source Browser] for the parts of source code hosted on Google Code.
